html: Justice standeth afar off— צדקה tsedakah , righteousness, put here, says Kimchi, for alms to the poor. This casts some light onMatthew 6:1 ; : "Take heed that you do not your alms," ελεημοσυνην . But the best copies have δικαιοσυνην , righteousness; the former having been inserted in the text at first merely as the explanation of the genuine and original word.
